page.title: 02THE VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: There are 24 children in the school. They are divided into two classes, one junior and one infant. There are two teachers. We start school at 9.15. The infants finish at 3.15 and the juniors finish at 3.45. We all stay at school for dinner. The school is an old brick building on the edge of the village. Children start school in the term when they are five and transfer to the secondary school when they are eleven years old. We have lessons in language, mathematics, topic, which is a mixture of geography, history and science, and other things like music and physical education. Most of the pages in this survey are about the family life and activities of the children in this school.
